Name: ATCo2
About the game: ATCo2 is a casual/serious game for aviation fans that want to learn more about sustainability impacts of aviation. You play an air traffic controller on different locations around the world. Your goal is to direct all planes to their target airports without any unnecessary detours. To get to the next level, you always have to keep an eye on the total CO2 emissions. Additionally you will get a lot of interesting information about the sustainability impacts of aviation. Key Features: get started immediately without the need for any instructions simple graphics, simple gameplay play and learn at the same time!
